document.full_text: the woman whose false accusations of sexual assault against duke university lacrosse players drew national attention has been indicted on a murder charge after the death of a man she allegedly stabbed.
document.title: former duke lacrosse accuser now faces murder charge
lines_and_colors: the woman whose false accusations of sexual assault against duke university lacrosse players drew national attention has been indicted on a murder charge after the death of a man she allegedly stabbed.
